faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How does the global distribution work?
faq.answer1: Your listings are automatically distributed to our network of 80+ premium property portals across 35+ countries.
faq.question2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. All plans are month-to-month with no long-term commitments.
faq.question3: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.answer3: We offer comprehensive support including dedicated account managers for higher-tier plans and 24/7 customer service.
faq.answer4: Yes, we provide custom enterprise solutions for large agencies and developers with specific requirements.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: The world's most trusted luxury real estate platform, connecting discerning buyers with premium properties across 35+ countries.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to luxury real estate by connecting buyers, sellers, and agents through cutting-edge technology and unparalleled service excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global standard for luxury property transactions, making international real estate accessible, transparent, and efficient for everyone.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From a simple idea to the world's leading luxury real estate platform
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2018, Properly began with a vision to revolutionize how luxury properties are marketed and discovered globally. Our founders recognized that the traditional real estate market was fragmented, with buyers and sellers struggling to connect across international boundaries.
story.paragraph2: What started as a platform for connecting European luxury properties with international buyers has evolved into the world's most comprehensive luxury real estate network, spanning 35+ countries and featuring over 10,000 premium properties.
story.paragraph3: Today, Properly serves over 200,000 real estate professionals and reaches more than 150 million potential buyers worldwide, making us the trusted choice for luxury property transactions globally.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our service, from technology to customer experience.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in honest, open communication and clear processes for all our stakeholders.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Building lasting relationships through reliability, security, and consistent delivery.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We succeed when our clients succeed, creating mutually beneficial long-term partnerships.

2018.title: Company Founded
2018.description: Properly launches with focus on European luxury properties

2019.description: Extended services to 15 countries and 1,000+ properties

2021.title: Technology Innovation
2021.description: Launched AI-powered property matching and virtual tours

2025.title: Future Vision
